issue.title: [Packaging][Linux][CI] Use Ubuntu 18.04 to build ARM64 packages on Travis CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9262](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9262). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We got the following error with Ubuntu 20.04:

```

gpg: Fatal: can't disable core dumps: Operation not permitted
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9262?focusedCommentId=17147471) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7573
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7573>
